A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Skywalkers portrayal in this installment was shameful.  Even Hamill said he felt as if the character shouldn't have even been called Luke.  Considered the most powerful Jedi in Star Wars Canon was turned into a joke.  The Yoda cameo was moronic. The ship on ship main plot was ridiculous and the side stories quite silly and nonsensical.  Sorry\, this was trash.
